member.name: T:HCM.Data.Common.BaseDeletableModel`1
member.summary: This abstract class may easily add usefull fields when inherited such us: bool IsDeleted, DateTime? DeletedOn, Id, DateTime CreatedOn and DateTime? ModifiedOn. Provides an easy way to keep deleted data in your database. "Soft delete" in database lingo means that you set a flag on an existing table which indicates that a record has been deleted, instead of actually deleting the record.
member.typeparam: This param would define the type of the model Id
